channel.title: I need some help
channel.description: I use moparscape i just started i got AIM and MSN I need some 1 to help me with pretty much everything main thing im trying to find out is how i change what a monster drops, how to make every 1 start lvl 3, how to spawn objects like furnaces ect. and how to make a mods see there own crown but still have uh mod powers i tryed player rights 2 lets u see gold crown but u cant spawn items or anything same with player rights 1 but silver crown I know how to do autospawn thing so when u login theres already monsters walking around i got there HP set and everything i know how to make items spawn on the ground how to change lvls and player rights and how to change items in shops but i dont know how to make a new shop just change 1s that already there most TUTs i read say open client.java alls i got is clienthandler this the same thing :confused: so some 1 plz help me just trying to learn some new stuff need to be taught step by step :P
